name: sabberworm/php-css-parser
description: Parser for CSS Files written in PHP

scripts-descriptions.ci: Runs all dynamic and static code checks (i.e. currently, only the static checks).
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:fixer: Checks the code style with PHP CS Fixer.
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:sniffer: Checks the code style with PHP_CodeSniffer.
scripts-descriptions.ci:static: Runs all static code analysis checks for the code.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php: Autofixes all autofixable issues in the PHP code.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php:fixer: Fixes autofixable issues found by PHP CS Fixer.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php:sniffer: Fixes autofixable issues found by PHP_CodeSniffer.
scripts-descriptions.phpstand:baseline: Updates the PHPStan baseline file to match the code.
